meta.title: Brew Logs
meta.description: Track your brews. Keep it consistent.

hero.title: Log brew. Repeat.
hero.description: Brew Logs helps you dial in your brews and repeat the cups that actually taste good. Log ratios, grind size, temp, and notes — then brew again without guessing.

problem_solution.title: Consistency is hard when you rely on memory.
problem_solution.description: Brew Logs saves the details that matter, so you can repeat great brews without trying to remember what you did last time.

features.duplicate: Duplicate a previous brew and tweak it slightly.
features.filter: Filter by method, beans, rating, or date.
features.search: Quick search to find that one brew you liked.

brew_list.title: Brew list
brew_list.description: Your full brew history. View details or duplicate to brew again.

stats.title: Quick stats
stats.description: Total brews, average rating, best cup, and most-used method.

filter.title: Filter & search
filter.description: Find brews by method, beans, rating, or date — fast.

new_brew.title: New brew
new_brew.description: A clean, focused form for logging a new brew.

live_brew.title: Live brew
live_brew.description: Real-time mode to follow your timer while brewing.

tabs.title: Tabs: Brew / New / Beans / Recipes
tabs.description: Simple navigation that feels great on mobile.

screens.title: Screens
screens.description: Designed for daily brewing — log fast, compare brews, and repeat what works.

cta.title: Ready for your next brew?
cta.description: Open the app and start logging your brews. Dial it in once, repeat it anytime.

who.question: Who is this for?
who.answer: Anyone who brews regularly and wants more consistent cups.

mobile.question: Can I use it on my phone?
mobile.answer: Yes. It's mobile-first and works great on desktop too.

track.question: What do you track?
track.answer: Ratio, grind size, water temp, brew time, rating, and notes — the stuff you actually care about.

duplicate.question: Why Duplicate?
duplicate.answer: So you can tweak a previous brew instead of starting from scratch.

offline.question: Does it work offline?
offline.answer: Yes. Once loaded, it works without internet. Your data stays on your device.

export.question: Can I export my data?
export.answer: Yes. You can export all your brews anytime — your data is yours to keep.
